title: Can we nerf Thresh already?
body:
There's something seriously wrong when you have a support played more than twice as much as everyone else and STILL has a higher winrate than most other supports. Also I'm just sick of seeing him. Give him the Ezreal treatment and nerf him into oblivion so he's out of the meta for once.

https://champion.gg/statistics/#?sortBy=role&order=ascend
